input.request: Get products in Electronics category under $100

gold: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 100

input.schema: orders(id, user_id, total, date), users(id, name)
input.request: Show order totals with user names

gold: SELECT o.total, u.name FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id
SELECT department, COUNT(*) FROM employees GROUP BY department

input.schema: sales(id, product_id, quantity, date), products(id, name)
input.request: Top 5 products by total quantity sold

gold: SELECT p.name, SUM(s.quantity) as total FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.id GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 5
